      toolId - - the tool to load on that position

    • getLoadedCuttingToolId

      Parameters:
      pocketNumber - - the pocket number of the carousel
      Returns:

      Returns:

    • getCarouselPocketPosition

      public int getCarouselPocketPosition​(int toolId)
      Parameters:
      toolId - - the id of the tool to search for
      Returns:
      the pocket number of the carousel that the tool was found (0 if not found)

    • getAllCarouselPockets

      public List<Integer[]> getAllCarouselPockets()
      Returns:
      a List of Integer[] containing all pockets (with or without tools). Each array has the following elements pocket[0] : The position in the pocket pocket[1] : The toolId of the tool in the pocket (it is 0 when no tool present)

    • getLoadedTools

      public List<CuttingTool> getLoadedTools()
      Returns:
      the list of toolIds for the corresponding pocket position

    • updateCarouselPocket

      public void updateCarouselPocket​(int position, int toolId)
      Parameters:
      position - - the pocket number of the specified tool
      toolId - - the tool to load on that position

    • deleteCarouselPocket

      public void deleteCarouselPocket​(int position)
      Parameters:
      position - - the pocket of the carousel to remove
